website_summaries.verdict: Monument Valley is excellent, mind-bending Android puzzle game, every screen of which is a work of art. And new expansions will entice players who've already completed their quest.
cons: Thin storyline, but balanced by a fun, gorgeous game

customer_reviews.title: Best. Game. Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is the best game I think I've ever played. It's for anyone, and has an enchanting story behind it. There are 10 chapters in which you need to guide princess Ida through impossible geometry, and while you work out a strategy, the game doesn't stress you! It's certainly worth the money. The only downside to this game is that saying "only one more go," is something you can't be truthful about! But no, the downside is that it's pretty short, but still takes a few hours; plus you can play it again and again! You should definitely buy this game, it's the best ever!!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: SkyStar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game ,challenging puzzles .
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the game or difficulty with puzzles. Love the graphics and originality
customer_reviews.author: susan relton-howie

customer_reviews.title: Fun but very short
customer_reviews.text: Great game but only took a few hours to complete. I expected something much longer. Nevertheless, enjoyable to play.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: beautifully designed, thought provoking game
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely fantastic little game. I just wish it went on even more. I don't quite understand the plot but the gamelan is outstanding. A unique style of playing and layers that keep unfolding as you discover more of the game make this so special. I can't believe I hadn't heard of this before. Deserving of so much more attention.
customer_reviews.author: $345drag5xsdefrz aquarium

customer_reviews.title: The only game I play that doesn't make me want ...
customer_reviews.text: The only game I play that doesn't make me want to launch my tablet across the floor when I'm not winning.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very good puzzle game
customer_reviews.text: It's really good game. It develops your spacial geometry feeling and such. The only thing is that it is very short. I was lucky to get it free through application of the day at Amazon. There are additional 8 levels you can buy for just under £2 and I'm thinking now about it.
customer_reviews.author: PavLove

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but stupidly short
customer_reviews.text: The game is so short that had I paid the full price, I would be really angry now. It only has 10 levels and if you're not careful, you can accidentally finish it in 20 minutes. It is beautiful but as soon as the levels start getting interesting, it ends. In a pc world, you would call this a demo.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kovac

customer_reviews.title: too good but too short!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent game. It's al little too short if you have to pay with only 10 levels but the concept and visuals are perfect. But to be honest, it's the cost of a pint so save your waistline and have 30 minutes of fun instead.
customer_reviews.author: dan-idoine

customer_reviews.title: Great but too short.
customer_reviews.text: There was something quite beautiful about this game. Sadly it didn't last long. The puzzles were fairly easy without being too trivial. The concept is fresh. Animation and artwork beautiful. Hopefully we'll see more levels.
customer_reviews.author: David in Hertfordshire

customer_reviews.title: absolutely flipping brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The game is unique, visually interesting and gives just enough puzzle to keep you thinking. The pleasure is in just playing rather than being all about solving it. There are no plugs for money or ads, which means that I have already bought the next one. This was the free app of the day but it worth paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: but she knew I would like this one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me to this game - she knows I'm not usually interested in games, but she knew I would like this one. She was right. I really love it! And I was so intrigued to see Potus playing it in the new series of House of Cards on Netflix!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting and charming. The princess has returned to redeem ...
customer_reviews.text: Enchanting and charming. The princess has returned to redeem her people and its ancient heritage. Guide her through the fantasy landscapes to find the lost geometric monuments. I got this as the free app of the day and went on to buy the other two installments.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wasn't sure what to expect or whether I would like it as its not what I would normally purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this when it was free app of the day wasn't sure what to expect or whether I would like it as its not what I would normally purchase but it was good fun trying to think in three D and rotate to get to where I was going ended up totally enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tascha

customer_reviews.title: stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Despite this game being rather short, the stunning imagery and captivating lands that have been created for Princess Ida to find her way through are alone worth the money for this beautiful and thought provoking puzzle game. The puzzles are clever with a strong hint towards the beautiful artwork of M.C.Escher with some difficult at times to work out. There is a story line of sorts which I found a sense of mystery to. I only just wish the levels were a bit longer, which is the only reason I have rated it with 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Harrison

customer_reviews.title: stunning
customer_reviews.text: This little game is truly stunning. It seems inspired by a journey meets echochrone theme, but it is simply brilliant. The forgotten shores expansion is even better, playing with 3D space in an Escher bending fashion. Its a bit short, but still worth it for me. Buy it with the credit from the right Amazon purchases like I did... :)
customer_reviews.author: AndyS

customer_reviews.title: fanbloomingtastic
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game, short but very sweet. Simple enought to put down and pickup again later but tricky enough to make you think. Most deffinately makes you look twice and make your eyes see what they are looking at an not what your brain is telling them!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tortoise

customer_reviews.title: Engaging, striking and worth the money (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: I personally got this game with the first 10 levels for free and then paid an extra £1.50 for 10 more levels. That, for me, was well worth it as it lasted around 4 hours (I did get stuck a few times though). The level designs resemble paintings by M.C Escher with 3D representations of optical illusions, requiring the player to navigate through them. I do hope they will continue to release new levels as I would gladly pay for them at that price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game has beautiful graphics. Plenty of head scratching moments whilst trying to figure out the next move. I purchased as free app of the day but I'm not sure the £2.49 price tag is justified when there are only 10 levels.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST AMAZING GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing game I have ever played!!!! They have even created MORE levels... it's worth every penny!!!! Great for all ages as it improves «mental and spatial memory» (for those who don't know what that means, it basically improves your spatial awareness)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from a non-gamer
customer_reviews.text: Very well thought out, atmospheric game. Graphics are exceptional. Music and sound effects match perfectly. I don't normally have time to spend on games but this one is addictive. Well done to the developers.
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought the forgotten shores add on!!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game. You have to think differently. No shooting, only tranquility. Enjoyed it so much I bought the add on The Forgotten Shores. Beautiful graphics and smooth transitions. Have suggested this game to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Craigview2

customer_reviews.title: A real gem and pleasure to play!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a extremely well thought out and put together game! This really took some hard thinking to come up with this beautiful game. It's a puzzle game but with optical illusion elements. I highly recommend you play this!
customer_reviews.author: Scientomology

customer_reviews.title: A Cute & Lovey Game For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: A cute and lovely game, with such atmospheric graphics, beautiful music to... it does get hard though so you will need to have your thinking cap on.... this game really does bring a ray of joy to any long journeys to while away the hours.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Mind bending
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful visuals and music accompany a unique occasionally quite challenging gameplay. And although quite short, you can play again a few weeks later without necessarily remembering the puzzle solutions. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Bates

customer_reviews.title: At 0.69p a great game, a bit short for full price
customer_reviews.text: You could easily complete this in the space of a couple of hours, every level is fun and incredibly satisfying but not particularly challenging. I would have been a bit dissapointed had I paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: D_Evans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The most captivating game on Android. The graphics are gorgeous. The sound, dreamlike. The whole experience is quite surreal and other worldly. It's more an experience than a game. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. LH

customer_reviews.title: Quite Enchanting
customer_reviews.text: What a delight to play, makes you think in three dimensions, so refreshing not having to blast your way through like so many other games. Never played anything. like it, wish there were more levels or follow up games, thoroughly recommend, plays beautifully on my Fire HD
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Monumental!
customer_reviews.text: What a unique game! Just started and already I'm hooked. The visuals are impressive, and trying to think in three dimensions in a 2D game can be challenging, but incredibly fun. The accompanying music and sounds complement the game play perfectly and make it quite an atmospheric experience. At last, something different.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: HOW much space for just new permissions?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this gorgeous game and just wish there was more of it. But what is with the massive update installation for just new permissions? I have over 600MB of free space and I still get a message saying there isn't enough!
customer_reviews.author: Aethelstan

customer_reviews.title: Great game, well optimized
customer_reviews.text: Great game, well optimized, very creative and aesthetically pleasing to look at. This product has been featured and recommended by loads of people and media reviewers and has been referenced in the US TV show House of Cards.
customer_reviews.author: Haydn Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Captivating little game
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to get this as a 'Free App of the Day' but even though the game is relatively short. Its completely captivating and the puzzles were hard enough to keep me entertained for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Dale

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend this game enough
customer_reviews.text: The game is not very long and won't take long to complete but the time that you will spend playing it is amazing! I found myself struggling to put my phone down and thinking to myself 'just one more level and then I'll stop'. The art-style is slick and colourful and the music/sound is very atmospheric and definitely adds to the experience. I can't recommend this game enough and it's easy to see how it's won so many awards!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly Created Unique
customer_reviews.text: A captivating and enchanting puzzle game. The puzzles are refreshing with a ground-breaking twist on logic. With silky graphics , an entertaining storyline and chill background music. The prefect balance between being a challenge and being stress-free. The perfect game to unwind with. More please!
customer_reviews.author: JasonA

customer_reviews.title: A wonderfully designed mind bending puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful beautifully designed mind bending puzzle game. The premise is simple the puzzles and landscape anything but. The music is calming also and so far I'm putting it at the top of my favourite game list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and elegant game. I particularly like the Escher style games it plays with perspective and geometry. Hardened gamers may find it easy but I am certainly finding the add-ons quite challenging.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER L SAUNDERS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant game. Not too easy, not too hard. Very original and relaxing to play. Love the graphics. Very clever and unusual to just use spatial awareness. Maybe could be adapted as an educational tool.
customer_reviews.author: jfh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn and fun
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on House of Cards and it was then free on Amazon app of the day. Needless to say I could not put it down. You can get through it in a few hours but it is well designed and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Leisurely paced logic game
customer_reviews.text: Graphically pleasing to the eye with high quality 3D effect. Steadily getting more difficult as you advance, but not too difficult. Haven't tried the extra levels as yet. Well worth what I had to pay for it on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Ajakz

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, and I have to admit that I found ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, and I have to admit that I found a walkthrough online to give me some hints, as this does test your brain power. The graphics are beautiful. Easy to learn and use.
customer_reviews.author: LNC

customer_reviews.title: Unique little Penrose puzzler that enchanted the socks off me!
customer_reviews.text: Simply a stunning little Penrose puzzler. Don't expect to get hours and hours from it, instead, sit back and relax into the intricate level design and game mechanics. Unique and a must have for any type of gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at. Entertaining to do.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely game. Good that there are no real instructions and you have to use reason to find your way through the beautifully realised, Escheresque world. Starts off fairly simply but there are some headscratchers later on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long, but enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Gentle game with nice graphics and certainly not over-challenging - easily completed in a fairly short evening session. But nice while it lasted and good as one of the free apps of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Peewee20

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but far to short.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics and controlled are very well done. The escher inspired artwork is wonderful. Some of the puzzles really do male you think but I completed it under 2 hours of not very intensive play. All in all defiantly worth a down load as the free app of the day. Not sure 8 additional levels is worth the £1.49 if they only last as long as the 10 original levels.
customer_reviews.author: joylessdave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great puzzle. Only downfall is, when you finish the game, that is it. Thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I loved playing this game. The graphics are amazing and can be challenging. I highly recommend this to everyone. If only it had more levels. Hoping there will be a Monument Valley 2 very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Juke

customer_reviews.title: wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful puzzle, really awesome. Makes you really think, it's so cleverly done. The 8 new levels are just as good, the last one is really tricky! Loved it, can't wait for more and more levels. EXCELLENT!!!!!!!.HURRY UP PLEASE! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant - everyone in my family from 10 year old to 60 year old couldn't put it down - both challenging and relaxing at the same time - can't wait for new episodes!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMop

customer_reviews.title: Downloaded on a whim...
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded this Monument Valley on a whim and I'm glad I did. Although the layout may seem basic at first sight on the first level or 2 (a little princess wandering around on some blocks), you soon realize it's so much more than that. The game has been put together beautifully with new options to move objects as the levels progress which with it brings more thought required from the player. A great game!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty game. As the levels unfold I found myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty game. As the levels unfold I found myself saying things such as 'thats cooool' and while the puzzles aren't greatly challenging I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. I do wish there were more levels, however that is a good trade off for quality
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I can not think of any other word that does this puzzler justice. Each level has been made with care and skill, and I am yet to get bored of the stunning paradoxical logic of the game. The audio is soothing and atmospheric and goes perfectly with the overall design. And the geometric art style although simplistic is Beautiful to behold... But most importantly it is fun to play. buy this game. Its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Jomaa

customer_reviews.title: Love every level
customer_reviews.text: Love every level, this is really an amazing game. It is a pity that only 10 level available. Yes, there is the Dream part which is great too. But for the 3rd part you have pay again. 😣
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Lendvai

customer_reviews.title: M.C. Escher meets Zen
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, logical, intriguing M.C.Escher type graphically impossible puzzles rendered with an almost Zen like calmness (apart from the crows). There are no ads or in-app purchases to take away from the feeling of being immersed in a different place and with only 10 levels, you can easily complete this in an absorbing afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: One of the few games I haven't deleted after about a day. I keep coming back to it for its magical qualities and some of the levels are complex enough that I still can't remember how to do them straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful game. Its a little short but stunning with just the right difficulty curve. Mind bending puzzles with a hint of surrealism. Great fun
customer_reviews.author: Phil Pasco

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but way too short in game pkay
customer_reviews.text: Graphics, sound and everything visually is beautiful. Only problem is that I completed the game in 25 mins. So you are really paying for time and effort put into building the visual aspects rather than any gameplay or challenge
customer_reviews.author: Carl Ward

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and gets you thinking. So good took my mind off dentist stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game - graphics gorgeous. Don't want to give too much away, all can say is Escher-esque. Had fun with it, and took my mind off incipient dental treatment. Anything that does that has to be great!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: been on my wish list for a while
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad this was a free app of the day but if i had known how good it is I'd of paid. Frustrating at times but I got lost for ages in it. Go for it while it's free or save your penny's up and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dja138

customer_reviews.title: One of the most original and most beautiful games ever!
customer_reviews.text: Forget the endless car racing, fighting and football games. This will convince you there are still creative, talented people around making wonderful games. Sheer pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: i_kko

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted geometrical puzzle game
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted geometrical puzzle game. Shame it does not have more levels; it seems a little bit pricey for the amount of play time one gets - still good for a week or more occasionally play.
customer_reviews.author: Francois D

customer_reviews.title: Cannot rate this highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Very good quirky game, worth paying for and now free app of the day. Only wish there were more levels. Very esher'esque.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad game with quite nice music but I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad game with quite nice music but I would have liked some instructions about playing the game easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely concept,clever well thought out puzzles that are not too taxing but enough to keep the intrigue. Suitable for the whole family. Strongly recommend . More like this please
customer_reviews.author: hidden object game fan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after watching one of my favourite YouTubers play this (JackSepticEye) I knew immediately I would buy this game and love it, and guess what... I DEFINITELY DID LOVE IT!😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: Crackingc little puzzle game, great simple graphics and some mind bending puzzles. Great game. You'll finish it quickly though and probably buy the add-on
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful & challenging gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: This game really encapsulates you right from the beginning! With such beautiful scenery and architectural designs throughout the game, it never fails to surprise you with its unique variety of challenges. I actually felt an emotional connection, as it continued and revealed more and more about the story. I couldn't stop playing it once I had started, and even my mum and sister became addicted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Milv3

customer_reviews.title: Truly wonderful game
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely fabulous game. Beautifully crafted and designed, well thought out, and the visuals and sound work excellently together. Although it is a relatively short game, it really is worth paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful piece of design and gameplay.
customer_reviews.text: A flawless piece of game design. Gameplay is simple and intuitive, Character design is cute and endearing in just a few tiny pixels. Level design is just taxing enough and a nod to a narrative, although not altogether clear, makes you wonder what the ultimate goal of the character is.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: awesome but too short
customer_reviews.text: The game was amazing, and the graphics were beautiful, but the game didn't have enough levels to give it five stars. I got it as free app of the day, but it is not worth paying for the amount of levels you get. Loved it but not enough levels for it to be worth anything.
customer_reviews.author: MR S N GARWOOD

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: What a captivating game. Beautifully designed and quite tricky. It is a wonderful game for a logical brain. I just wish there were more levels to it. I will certainly be looking for more games by the same designer.
customer_reviews.author: JulesC

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful, in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful graphics and movement, appears to be one of the simplest games you will ever play, except every level gets progressively more difficult. Using nothing but logic and common sense, find your way through each portal.
customer_reviews.author: WhizzKid

customer_reviews.title: simply lovely
customer_reviews.text: Don't often leave reviews but got this when it was the free app of the day and loved it. It's simple clean and a delight to play. If a follow up comes out I will be purchasing that.
customer_reviews.author: A. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Wow! what a beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what a beautiful game. Looks stunning with fantastic music. Really enjoyed playing this, not particularly long or challenging but well worth the small price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: stunning
customer_reviews.text: I love this game can't put it down it's an escape to a beautiful other world , hope there's another monument valley coming soon whatever you pay for it is worth every penny .
customer_reviews.author: starla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well thought out levels
customer_reviews.text: A fairly short game but worth every penny, bought the extra levels too and I'm glad i did. This game makes a puzzle out of an Esher painting and you can see the thought that went into each and every level's design. Beautifully simple but still challenging. If you haven't tried it, you are missing out
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: finally a worthy free app of the day
customer_reviews.text: Cracking game, cracking graphics.. Really short for the price i completed it in around an hour..but it was free. So awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful game with clever twists
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful game with clever twists, i thoroughly enjoyed playing this puzzle game with help from my 10 year old son who liked playing it too. lovely optical illusions, please create more games like this!
customer_reviews.author: gaslamalan

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best game i played in 2014
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best game i played in 2014, and that includes several games on Xbox. Simple concept, beautifully crafted game - proper headscratcher!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great but too short
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game but far too short. I completed it within an hour. I'm now trying to spread out the additional levels I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's the kind of computer game even ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's the kind of computer game even a grown-up can understand, and enjoy. No blood, no race against time, just a very calm little puzzle, beautifully made. Ideal for 40+.
customer_reviews.author: w7

customer_reviews.title: great game :)
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I liked this game a lot. The graphics are just out of this world and mind bending!!!! Never seen anything like it. The levels were testing enough but not too hard, although it gets more difficult as the game goes on. Yes, it is a bit short and wish it was longer, a testament to how good it is. Please bring up more levels :)
customer_reviews.author: mals

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever
customer_reviews.text: This game is so beautiful and well designed that I find myself going back to it every month! It really is the best game I have played - there are so many puzzle games out there (free as well) but Monument Valley is 100 times better and well worth the money. Got it from an app store voucher and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Roy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this game. It's a "get your character from A to B" game by solving puzzles but in a novel 3D meets 2D world. Still working my way through it. Have a go - if you're into these games, I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant game. I found it very absorbing. The puzzles are very clever and the graphics are beautifully simple. Only problem with it is I finished the levels to quickly. But you can always go back and play them again. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillipa Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Triumph
customer_reviews.text: This is the only game I can be bothered to try to get to the next level on. Beautifully designed and implemented. It's a triumph. Ustwo studio should be proud.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: most visually stunning game I have seen on a tablet. ever. I will be buying the second game. also really evocative - I was really quite moved at the end of chapter 6 when.... well... I wouldn't want to ruin it for you, buy the game and see :)
customer_reviews.author: Miss E Bardo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic magical and sheer genius
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game and after completing machinarium I was looking for a new adventure. This game did not disappoint. It's genius and bewildering and like some sort of matrix world of geometry! I highly recommend it - only wish there were more levels cos I had it completed in just over an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: The game isn't the longest; but it is beautiful, just challenging enough for me at least, and with a wonderful melancholy atmosphere. In my top three games so far.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Ico ish puzzler.
customer_reviews.text: The game is short, but the game is beautiful. Reminded me very much of ico. Lovely to play. Really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Pipmonkey

customer_reviews.title: More than just a puzzle game
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect from this game. There is nothing similar that I know of. It really is like exploring an Escher picture. It is not very difficult and can be played straight through very quickly but it is superbly innovative and the graphic style blends perfectly to make this more than just a puzzle game.
customer_reviews.author: illumin8

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I've basically told everyone I know about this game and how they need to play it. I can't get over how clever the puzzles are while not intimidating those of us who might not be on a genius level. Cannot rave enough about how beautiful the graphics unfold. A great game all the way around. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany KB

customer_reviews.title: Short, really quite short
customer_reviews.text: I got this for free in a daily deal. And it's really lovely, really pretty, and really short
customer_reviews.author: G. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brain teaser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent FAOTD, download it now and you will not regret it. It is a charming way to while away some free time.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Cute game, great graphic. I love the puzzle games and this one proves to be fun and gets more challenging as you go on. I recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Best game I've played in some time. Over all too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Aoki Masaharu

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful game and the music is so soothing
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend who is not a gamer loves this. It's a beautiful game and the music is so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Alaksandar S.

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have only played 5 levels so far and this is mind-bendingly brilliant. If you like a puzzle that makes you think then you will love this. DO NOT miss this while it is free app of the day. try it you have nothing to lose and I think a lot to gain.
customer_reviews.author: D. Headford

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful, fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, fun game. Sadly it's let down by being so very short. There are extra levels, but at another £1.50 for eight it seems a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: wheelybird

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful must have.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasingly lateral and ridiculously addictive. Relax to the visuals and enjoy again and again this must have game.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Short, but beautiful and interesting game
customer_reviews.text: A beautifully presented puzzle game with a real twist from its M.C.Escher style environment. It's very short, but really enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: alw Audio

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning, simple game that is so clever and mind,,,, boggling! If you like the room games you will love this even more as its cute tooooo! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Millie Mae
